section.title: &mtprint; The &MiKTeXPrintUtility;
section.para: You can use the &MiKTeXPrintUtility; to send &TeX; output files (*.dvi) to a printing device.
The &MiKTeXPrintUtility; is started in the command prompt window. To print the &DVI; file foo.dvi, do this:

step.para: The &DVI; file is converted by &Dvips; into an intermediate &PostScript; file.
The &PostScript; file is then processed by &Ghostscript; to produce a series of Windows Bitmaps.
These bitmaps are then sent to the printer.
